text: Ariko wawundi wabwiye ababyeyi be amagambo yo kubinuba (ubwo bamuhamagariraga kwemera Allah n’izuka) agira ati "Ese muransezeranya ko nzazurwa mu gihe hari ibisekuru byahise mbere yanjye (bitigeze bizurwa)? Mu gihe (ababyeyi be) bitabaza Allah bamubwira bati "Nya korama! Emera! Rwose isezerano rya Allah ni ukuri". Ariko we akavuga ati "Ibi nta kindi biricyo usibye ko ari inkuru z’abo hambere
